kv8.4:5.5: Hañci atthi tappaṭisaṃyutto chando, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv8.4:5.7: Nanu atthi tappaṭisaṃyutto rāgo tappaṭisaṃyutto chando tappaṭisaṃyutto chandarāgo tappaṭisaṃyutto saṅkappo tappaṭisaṃyutto rāgo tappaṭisaṃyutto saṅkapparāgo tappaṭisaṃyuttā pīti tappaṭisaṃyuttaṃ somanassaṃ tappaṭisaṃyuttaṃ pītisomanassanti?
kv8.4:5.9: Hañci atthi tappaṭisaṃyuttaṃ pītisomanassaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv8.4:6.9: kāyaviññeyyā phoṭṭhabbā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā—
kv8.4:7.8: kāyaviññeyyā phoṭṭhabbā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā—
kv8.4:7.10: Api ca, bhikkhave, nete kāmā kāmaguṇā nāmete ariyassa vinaye vuccan”ti—
kv8.4:8.2: Na te kāmā yāni citrāni loke;
